info.description:
API request bodies and responses are usually JSON-encoded, except for binary data and some of the OAuth2 endpoints. Note that the `Content-Type` header must be set to `application/json` for this, as the request may otherwise fail with error 400.
When clients have a valid access token, e.g. obtained through the `POST /api/v1/session` or `POST /api/v1/oauth/token` endpoint, they can use a standard Bearer Authorization header to authenticate their requests. Submitting the access token with a custom `X-Auth-Token` header is supported as well.
info.title: PhotoPrism API

get.summary: finds albums and returns them as JSON

parameters.description: properties of the album to be created (currently supports Title and Favorite)
parameters.name: album

put.summary: updates album metadata like title and description

post.summary: creates a new album containing pictures from other albums

parameters.description: UID of the album to which the pictures are to be added
parameters.name: uid

get.summary: streams the album contents as zip archiv

post.summary: sets the favorite flag for an album

delete.summary: removes the favorite flag from an album

parameters.description: user-specific security token provided with session or 'public' when running PhotoPrism in public mode
parameters.name: token

post.summary: approves multiple photos that are currently under review
moves multiple photos to the archive
permanently removes multiple or all photos from the archive
toggles private state of multiple photos
restores multiple photos from the archive

get.summary: returns the client configuration values as JSON
searches the error logs and returns the results as JSON

delete.summary: removes all entries from the error logs

get.summary: finds and returns faces as JSON

parameters.description: hash (string) SHA-1 hash of the file
parameters.name: hash

parameters.description: user-specific security token provided with session or 'public' when running PhotoPrism in public mode
parameters.name: token

get.summary: finds and returns labels as JSON

post.summary: sets favorite flag for a label

delete.summary: removes favorite flag from a label

parameters.description: user-specific security token provided with session or 'public' when running PhotoPrism in public mode
parameters.name: token

get.summary: finds pictures and returns them as JSON

parameters.description: groups consecutive files that belong to the same photo
parameters.name: merged

put.summary: updates picture details and returns them as JSON

parameters.description: properties to be updated. Only submit values that should be changed.
parameters.name: photo

put.summary: changes the orientation of a file

get.summary: returns the user app settings as JSON
returns a thumbnail image with the requested size

parameters.description: SHA1 file hash, optionally with a crop area suffixed, e.g. '-016014058037'
parameters.name: thumb

parameters.description: user-specific security token provided with session or 'public' when running PhotoPrism in public mode
parameters.name: token

get.summary: returns a video, optionally limited to a byte range for streaming

parameters.description: user-specific security token provided with session
parameters.name: token
